== Kubuntu Meeting Minutes ==
The Kubuntu Meeting Minutes are provided to give you an overview of the meeting. Each page should hopefully present to you in a fashionable manner, persons present, agenda items, as well the responses to each agend item. Minutes for each meeting should be available within a couple hours of adjournment.

== Previous Kubuntu Meeting Minutes ==

== Create New Page ==
To create a new minutes page, enter the date as '''"YYYY-MM-DD"''' in the following box, and click create.
